name: Heaven's Hell (Nayu, Kokiri)
description:
After the demons stole important treasures from the gods, the brave warriors of heaven decide to get them back. It is up to you to prevent the invasion of the angels.

Heavens Hell is a rogue-like tower defense game, which takes place in a demonic battlefield. Fight against graceful warriors and place your powerful towers to defense your beloved home and treasure.

I'm not sure if it's the alcohol or my imagination, but somehow, I feel like this world is going to be destroyed by Heaven.

Left Mouse Button - to pick and drop
